content: this text is about a legal case in the supreme court of croatia it provides a summary of the progress of the case without mentioning the names of the parties involved the case is about a legal procedure called cost procedure in the first instance the final resolution was made by the municipal court in šibenik the plaintiff was determined to be the coowner of a 23 share of a property while the defendants were determined to be coowners of a 13 share the property is located in šibenik municipality and includes additional movable property the coownership between the parties was dissolved and the defendants were ordered to pay the plaintiff an amount of 454000 hrk the decision was based on three specific laws unfortunately the text does not provide any further information or details about the progress of the case or the parties involved
